headline: FlightSafety International Appoints Eric Hinson as Chief Executive Officer
summary: COLUMBUS, Ohio, December 01, 2025--FlightSafety International Inc. today announced the appointment of Eric Hinson as chief executive officer, effective immediately. Hinson will succeed former president Barbara Telek who recently announced her retirement.

headline: Mark Henefeld Joins Roofing Corp of America as Its Chief Financial Officer
summary: ATLANTA, December 01, 2025--Roofing Corp of America is pleased to announce that Mark Henefeld has joined the Atlanta, GA based Roofing Services holding company, as its Chief Financial Officer. Mark arrives at RCA with more than twenty years of experience leading finance and accounting functions at leading industrial and service companies.

headline: 1 Safe-and-Steady Stock for Long-Term Investors and 2 We Brush Off
summary: Low-volatility stocks may offer stability, but that often comes at the cost of slower growth and the upside potential of more dynamic companies.
